Automated Work Allocation

• March, 2019 — June, 2019

A project of Automated Appointment Allocation System sponsored by UNITI Software, which allocates the patients’ appointments automatically to health workers from algorithm result and performs manual changes to the result based on user’s preference.

  • Lead front end developers
  • Set up and architected a Vue web app for the front-end of the system
  • Coded user-customisable web pages to convert raw data to easily understandable tabular/graphical formats, and allow a user to alter, undo and save the schedule via async request with Axios.
  • Worked closely with BA, back-end developers and testers with agile development practices.
  • Key Techniques : VueJS, Spring Boot, NPM, Axios, Git, Trello, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Webpack, REST API.
